text: Francis "Frank" Martin Willis (October 13, 1915 - November 2, 1991) was a Canadian canoeist who competed in the 1936 Summer Olympics. He died in Kingston, Ontario. In 1936 he and his partner Edward Deir finished sixth in the K-2 1000 m event. Willis also competed with his partner Stanley Potter in the folding K-2 10000 m event where they finished tenth. ==References== * Category:1915 births Category:1991 deaths Category:Canadian male canoeists Category:Canoeists at the 1936 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic canoeists of Canada
title: Frank Willis (canoeist)
